nls.description: Lookup for Plan By Detail Captions
nls.name: Plan By Detail Captions

dynamicLookup.nsql:
SELECT @SELECT:DATA.PK_KEY:PK_KEY@ , @SELECT:DATA.ID:ID@ , @SELECT:DATA.NAME:NAME@ , @SELECT:DATA.CODE:CODE@ FROM (
SELECT 'FIN_TRANSCLASSES:'@+@CAST(ID AS NVARCHAR) PK_KEY , ID , DESCRIPTION NAME , TRANSCLASS CODE FROM TRANSCLASS
UNION
SELECT 'SCH_BROWSE_ROLE:'@+@CAST(SR.ID AS NVARCHAR) PK_KEY , SR.ID ID , SR.LAST_NAME NAME , SR.UNIQUE_NAME CODE FROM SRM_RESOURCES SR, PRJ_RESOURCES PR WHERE sr.id = pr.prid and pr.prisrole = 1
UNION
SELECT 'SCH_BROWSE_ROLE:NOT_SPECIFIED' PK_KEY , 0 ID , 'NOT_SPECIFIED' NAME , 'NOT_SPECIFIED' CODE FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 'LOOKUP_CHARGE_CODES:'@+@CAST(CC.PRID AS NVARCHAR) PK_KEY , CC.PRID ID , CC.PRNAME NAME , CC.PREXTERNALID CODE FROM PRCHARGECODE CC
UNION
SELECT 'FIN_BROWSE_USER_LOV2:'@+@CAST(ID AS NVARCHAR) PK_KEY , ID , NAME , LOOKUP_CODE CODE FROM CMN_LOOKUPS_V WHERE LOOKUP_TYPE = 'PRTIMEENTRY_USER_LOV2' AND LANGUAGE_CODE = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ AND IS_ACTIVE = 1
UNION
SELECT 'FIN_BROWSE_USER_LOV2:NOT_SPECIFIED' PK_KEY , 0 ID , 'NOT_SPECIFIED' NAME , 'NOT_SPECIFIED' CODE FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 'FIN_BROWSE_USER_LOV1:NOT_SPECIFIED' PK_KEY , 0 ID , 'NOT_SPECIFIED' NAME , 'NOT_SPECIFIED' CODE FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 'FIN_BROWSE_USER_LOV1:'@+@CAST(ID AS NVARCHAR) PK_KEY , ID , NAME , LOOKUP_CODE CODE FROM CMN_LOOKUPS_V WHERE LOOKUP_TYPE = 'PRTIMEENTRY_USER_LOV1' AND LANGUAGE_CODE = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ AND IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'A' FROM CMN_OPTION_VALUES WHERE OPTION_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM CMN_OPTIONS WHERE OPTION_CODE = 'NKT.GEN.LOOKUP_4_USER_VALUE1') AND USER_ID IS NULL AND VALUE = 'PRTIMEENTRY_USER_LOV1') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CMN_OPTION_VALUES WHERE OPTION_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM CMN_OPTIONS WHERE OPTION_CODE = 'CMN_ENABLE_ML') AND VALUE = '1')
UNION
SELECT 'FIN_BROWSE_USER_LOV1:'@+@CAST(ID AS NVARCHAR) PK_KEY , ID , LOOKUP_CODE NAME , LOOKUP_CODE CODE FROM USER_LOV1_ALL_V WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'A' FROM CMN_OPTION_VALUES WHERE OPTION_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM CMN_OPTIONS WHERE OPTION_CODE = 'NKT.GEN.LOOKUP_4_USER_VALUE1') AND USER_ID IS NULL AND VALUE = 'PRTIMEENTRY_USER_LOV1') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CMN_OPTION_VALUES WHERE OPTION_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM CMN_OPTIONS WHERE OPTION_CODE = 'CMN_ENABLE_ML') AND VALUE = '1')
) DATA WHERE @FILTER@

SELECT @SELECT:DATA.PK_KEY:PK_KEY@ , @SELECT:DATA.ID:ID@ , @SELECT:DATA.NAME:NAME@ , @SELECT:DATA.CODE:CODE@ FROM (
SELECT 'FIN_TRANSCLASSES:'@+@ID PK_KEY , ID , DESCRIPTION NAME , TRANSCLASS CODE FROM TRANSCLASS
UNION
SELECT 'SCH_BROWSE_ROLE:'@+@SR.ID PK_KEY , SR.ID ID , SR.LAST_NAME NAME , SR.UNIQUE_NAME CODE FROM SRM_RESOURCES SR, PRJ_RESOURCES PR WHERE sr.id = pr.prid and pr.prisrole = 1
UNION
SELECT 'SCH_BROWSE_ROLE:NOT_SPECIFIED' PK_KEY , 0 ID , 'NOT_SPECIFIED' NAME , 'NOT_SPECIFIED' CODE FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 'LOOKUP_CHARGE_CODES:'@+@CC.PRID PK_KEY , CC.PRID ID , CC.PRNAME NAME , CC.PREXTERNALID CODE FROM PRCHARGECODE CC
UNION
SELECT 'FIN_BROWSE_USER_LOV2:'@+@ID PK_KEY , ID , NAME , LOOKUP_CODE CODE FROM CMN_LOOKUPS_V WHERE LOOKUP_TYPE = 'PRTIMEENTRY_USER_LOV2' AND LANGUAGE_CODE = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ AND IS_ACTIVE = 1
UNION
SELECT 'FIN_BROWSE_USER_LOV2:NOT_SPECIFIED' PK_KEY , 0 ID , 'NOT_SPECIFIED' NAME , 'NOT_SPECIFIED' CODE FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 'FIN_BROWSE_USER_LOV1:NOT_SPECIFIED' PK_KEY , 0 ID , 'NOT_SPECIFIED' NAME , 'NOT_SPECIFIED' CODE FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 'FIN_BROWSE_USER_LOV1:'@+@ID PK_KEY , ID , NAME , LOOKUP_CODE CODE FROM CMN_LOOKUPS_V WHERE LOOKUP_TYPE = 'PRTIMEENTRY_USER_LOV1' AND LANGUAGE_CODE = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ AND IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'A' FROM CMN_OPTION_VALUES WHERE OPTION_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM CMN_OPTIONS WHERE OPTION_CODE = 'NKT.GEN.LOOKUP_4_USER_VALUE1') AND USER_ID IS NULL AND VALUE = 'PRTIMEENTRY_USER_LOV1') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CMN_OPTION_VALUES WHERE OPTION_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM CMN_OPTIONS WHERE OPTION_CODE = 'CMN_ENABLE_ML') AND VALUE = '1')
UNION
SELECT 'FIN_BROWSE_USER_LOV1:'@+@ID PK_KEY , ID , LOOKUP_CODE NAME , LOOKUP_CODE CODE FROM USER_LOV1_ALL_V WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'A' FROM CMN_OPTION_VALUES WHERE OPTION_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM CMN_OPTIONS WHERE OPTION_CODE = 'NKT.GEN.LOOKUP_4_USER_VALUE1') AND USER_ID IS NULL AND VALUE = 'PRTIMEENTRY_USER_LOV1') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CMN_OPTION_VALUES WHERE OPTION_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM CMN_OPTIONS WHERE OPTION_CODE = 'CMN_ENABLE_ML') AND VALUE = '1')
) DATA WHERE @FILTER@

SELECT @SELECT:DATA.PK_KEY:PK_KEY@ , @SELECT:DATA.ID:ID@ , @SELECT:DATA.NAME:NAME@ , @SELECT:DATA.CODE:CODE@ FROM (
SELECT 'FIN_TRANSCLASSES:'||ID PK_KEY , ID , DESCRIPTION AS NAME , TRANSCLASS CODE FROM TRANSCLASS
UNION
SELECT 'SCH_BROWSE_ROLE:'||SR.ID PK_KEY , SR.ID ID , SR.LAST_NAME AS NAME , SR.UNIQUE_NAME CODE FROM SRM_RESOURCES SR, PRJ_RESOURCES PR WHERE sr.id = pr.prid and pr.prisrole = 1
UNION
SELECT 'SCH_BROWSE_ROLE:NOT_SPECIFIED' PK_KEY , 0 ID , 'NOT_SPECIFIED' AS NAME , 'NOT_SPECIFIED' CODE FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 'LOOKUP_CHARGE_CODES:'||CC.PRID PK_KEY , CC.PRID ID , CC.PRNAME AS NAME , CC.PREXTERNALID CODE FROM PRCHARGECODE CC
UNION
SELECT 'FIN_BROWSE_USER_LOV2:'||ID PK_KEY , ID , NAME , LOOKUP_CODE CODE FROM CMN_LOOKUPS_V WHERE LOOKUP_TYPE = 'PRTIMEENTRY_USER_LOV2' AND LANGUAGE_CODE = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ AND IS_ACTIVE = 1
UNION
SELECT 'FIN_BROWSE_USER_LOV2:NOT_SPECIFIED' PK_KEY , 0 ID , 'NOT_SPECIFIED' AS NAME , 'NOT_SPECIFIED' CODE FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 'FIN_BROWSE_USER_LOV1:NOT_SPECIFIED' PK_KEY , 0 ID , 'NOT_SPECIFIED' AS NAME , 'NOT_SPECIFIED' CODE FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 'FIN_BROWSE_USER_LOV1:'||ID PK_KEY , ID , NAME , LOOKUP_CODE CODE FROM CMN_LOOKUPS_V WHERE LOOKUP_TYPE = 'PRTIMEENTRY_USER_LOV1' AND LANGUAGE_CODE = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ AND IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'A' FROM CMN_OPTION_VALUES WHERE OPTION_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM CMN_OPTIONS WHERE OPTION_CODE = 'NKT.GEN.LOOKUP_4_USER_VALUE1') AND USER_ID IS NULL AND VALUE = 'PRTIMEENTRY_USER_LOV1') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CMN_OPTION_VALUES WHERE OPTION_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM CMN_OPTIONS WHERE OPTION_CODE = 'CMN_ENABLE_ML') AND VALUE = '1')
UNION
SELECT 'FIN_BROWSE_USER_LOV1:'||ID PK_KEY , ID , LOOKUP_CODE AS NAME , LOOKUP_CODE CODE FROM USER_LOV1_ALL_V WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'A' FROM CMN_OPTION_VALUES WHERE OPTION_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM CMN_OPTIONS WHERE OPTION_CODE = 'NKT.GEN.LOOKUP_4_USER_VALUE1') AND USER_ID IS NULL AND VALUE = 'PRTIMEENTRY_USER_LOV1') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CMN_OPTION_VALUES WHERE OPTION_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM CMN_OPTIONS WHERE OPTION_CODE = 'CMN_ENABLE_ML') AND VALUE = '1')
) DATA WHERE @FILTER@
